          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrophilic addition of bromine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrophile Hinzufügung des Broms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajout électrophile du brome</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the mechanism for the electrophilic addition of bromine to alkenes.</string>
